data.text: @garthmullins Surprising given eg. of Brazil's HIV fight in 1990s. As part of its innovative strategies, it claimed a national emergency; didn't honor TRIP; & made its own antivirals. The exemption clause is in WIPO agreement. Brazil's precedent ignored w/ COVID & profits over people secured
@garthmullins Exactly. Conservative Democrats and their nominally progressive nonprofit junior partners created a vacuum into which Fox has insinuated itself, setting SF's agenda.

@garthmullins The situation in SF has deteriorated into unimaginable public squalor as conservative Dems use homeless people political wedges to marginalize progressives whose "Care Not Cash" nonprofits get paid to mark time, keep them employed, being compassionate, doing nothing.
@ec0anarch0 I was in SF the time of the Matrix program. Squatting, wired to black tar heroin, etc. Still got some tickets.
@ec0anarch0 And then those feel-good state containment gestures get weaponized by the right and blamed for capitalism's crisis. Sanfransicko, for example.

@garthmullins Whenever anyone tries to stand up an independent progressive/left political formation in San Francisco, staffers paid with our tax dollars work overtime to coopt and neutralize the threat. They've shot down 4-5 efforts over the past 20 yr.

@garthmullins In the US, the Democrat Party big city patronage network centers around poverty and ethnicity nonprofits that exist so that atomized people can tell their stories and then be subjugated to roll over for capitalist imperative.
@ec0anarch0 We have similar processes at work in Canada. The political middle (Liberal, NDP) seeks to tame and co-opt social movements.
